Moloko (Məlokwo) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia nke a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Cameroon.
Baka nke nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ukwuu bụ ma ọ bụ olumba ma ọ bụ asụsụ yiri ya.
Ndị Melokwo (ndị na-asụ 8,500) na-ebi na Moloko massif, inselberg dịpụrụ adịpụ na mbara ala, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ugwu Mandara, n'etiti Osimiri Mayo-Mangafé na Osimiri Mayo -Ranéo
Ha bi n'obodo nta nke Mokyo na mpaghara ndị gbara Makalingay canton gburugburu, Tokombéré arrondissement, Mayo-Sava department.
A na-ekwu na Moloko nwere naanị otu ụdaume /a/, ụfọdụ nyocha na-agụ ụdaume 2 /a, ə/.
